tool_description: A tracking API to track TCS consignments
name: TCS Tracker
title: TCS Tracker

api_list.name: Get Consignment Information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tcs-tracker.p.rapidapi.com/couriers/tcs/807018724666"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tcs-tracker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tcs-tracker.p.rapidapi.com/couriers/tcs/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tcs-tracker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
